title: Burrito Bar and Kitchen
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fun Mexican restaurant that has the option for soy cheese and soy sour cream, green and brown rice (vegan), black beans, vegan burritos, tacos and nachos as well as other vegan options. Has a smoothie station and in-house-made dressings (carrot, ginger-lemon and raspberry vinaigrette).
